resources.string: When: Friday July 15 6pm to 12pm and Saturday July 16 12pm to 12am
Where: Markham Civic Centre 101 Town Centre Boulevard

Power Unit Youth Organization will be celebrating its 10th year as organizers of Night It Up! This event will encompass booths and performances catering to all senses â€“ exotic foods, a plethora of home grown performances, merchandise booths with novelty items, and quintessential game booths
This app was made by Steven D\'Costa and Hiroshi Kuniyoshi
